entry.title: Winter's Onset Will Change the War in Ukraine
entry.content: Armies on both sides are girding for cold weather and shorter days, which will deepen logistical difficulties and take a toll on troops’ health and morale and weapons systems.

entry.title: Russia Moves to Defend Kherson Against Ukraine's Advance Before Winter
entry.content: Moscow is building “territorial defense” units in the occupied cities, a significant prize from the war’s early days, as Kyiv presses for gains before cold weather complicates the fighting.
